definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: limp (Thes sub I. ´[[פ]] but dub.; Ar. fasaxa is dislocate; acc. to Gerber:73 II. ´[[פ]] is denom. fr. [[פִּסֵּחַ]] [and this sub I. ´[[פ]]?]);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּפּׂל וַיִּפָּסֵחַ]] 2Sa 4:4 and he fell and was made limping (lame).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיְפַמְּחוּ עַל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] 1Ki 18:26 they went limping (along by the altar), i.e. prob. in their dance, v. Kit Pietschm:Phön. 220 (Gr [[ויפסעו]] [ = [[וַיִּפְשְׂעוּ]]] stepped).
